entries: You know that the only way your homeland of Vidrian can remain free from outside conquerors is by forging a strong and unified government. As such, you seek to bind your fellow citizens together through careful diplomacy and force of personalityâ€”or, if necessary, subterfuge and intrigue.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Dexterity or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Diplomacy} skill and the {@skill Lore||Politics Lore} skill.
